mapper.select: SELECT IA.ST_NAME ST_NAME, FL.FOOD_NAME AS FOOD_NAME, IA.ST_LOCATION AS ST_LOCATION FROM ST_FOOD SF JOIN ST_LIST SL ON SF.ST_NUM = SL.ST_NUM JOIN FOOD_LABEL FL ON SF.FOOD_NUM = FL.FOOD_NUM JOIN IN_PROCESS IP ON SL.IN_PROCESS_NUM = IP.IN_PROCESS_NUM JOIN IN_APPLY IA ON IP.IN_APPLY_NUM = IA.IN_APPLY_NUM WHERE SL.ST_NUM = {st_num}
